name: Power Pair
description:
Winner of Brains Eden 2019 "Best PC Game" and "Best Game Concept".

A 2-player puzzle game for 1 controller. Zap tesla coils to activate a chain reaction and light up the entire room. Work together with your friend to solve a series of increasingly difficult puzzle rooms to reach the basement generator.

Recommended for 2 players but can be played singleplayer. Controller required.

Made in 48 hours at the Brains Eden 2019 Game Jam by:

Arsi Patala - Programming / Music

Mikko Tamper & Adrian Horodyski - 3D Art / Animation

Robert Raulus - Level Design / UI
